top_comments.comment: Well, we have to admit that Chucky is way sexier than Dave

This was one of my favorite songs back in high school. Great cover, the slower tempo and the vocal tones held deeper and longer. Visuals were ... interesting for the song. will have to rewatch and  try to figure out what you were saying in all that. I do have to ask though how could you guys not do one of the MOST ICONIC drum fills in history.

comments_since_last_sample.body: Ты конечно меня не понимаешь, но  ты делаешь оч круто,  это прям крутяк)))
damn i can't believe that dude with 10 inches got beaten by chucky
Someone knows which mic she uses? .-.
Anyone else in the uk remember the ad of the gorilla doing this.
Better than the In This moment cover
Don't tear this photo up, I want 😂. But when I saw the kisses and the cute couple, I thought it was beautiful. You always amaze me, I love it.🖤🤘

🙄 No saben como envidio a chucky. 
Hasta se casó con violet,  QUE ENVIDIAAAA...
The cover is fantastic. But the video is also really great. In the air fits well with the horror  vibe. Also Chucky look was so much better than what we got right now.
What's the deal with the card. If you don't know that's what the songs about by now you're brain dead. But dam does not work with your style. Whips and hugs
Love the VHS quality to the ritual scenes. Nice job Violet and team! 🤘💜

This was one of my favorite songs back in high school. Great cover, the slower tempo and the vocal tones held deeper and longer. Visuals were ... interesting for the song. will have to rewatch and  try to figure out what you were saying in all that. I do have to ask though how could you guys not do one of the MOST ICONIC drum fills in history.
Won’t lie, if you ever made Violet Orlandi dolls in the style of Chucky & Tiffany, it would be the first and only YouTuber merch I would own xD
Loved the cover but I gotta ask, how did you get the ritual to work without saying the magic words and finishing the incantation with "What a crock!"?
Very good awesome I love it so much Tanks you think you Violet 😘💖✨

This song originally is dark & melancholic but love the rock nature of it which is a nice fit for the Chucky video.
Love the dark elements captured in this cover.
Nice👌
Chucky scared the sh... Out of me as a kid - still Does and you kissed him... Urrgh! Weirdo!!💀💀☠️
